column4: I was running ubuntu and I installed the kubuntu desktop package, now I want to go back to the ubuntu desktop, how do I uninstall all of the packages that kubuntu desktop installed?
just select gnome at the gdm login screen. No need to remove packages
I did that but now I stall have all of the kubuntu programs that I don't need like ktorrent and konqueror and kontact etc. I just want to remove all those. do I have to remove them all separately?
are you running out of space?
no I just don't want multiple programs that do the same thing
